      • getTerrainVersion

        public abstract int getTerrainVersion()

      • lock

        public abstract int lock​(GLMapView view,
                         java.util.Collection<TerrainTile> tiles)
        Obtains the terrain tiles to be rendered for the scene. The tiles are locked, and the mesh data is not eligible for deletion until they are unlocked via unlock(Collection)
        Parameters:
        view - The current scene. If null is specified, the the tiles returned from the last call to lock(GLMapView, Collection) will be returned.
        tiles - The terrain tiles
        Returns:
        The terrain version associated with the returned tiles

      • unlock

        public abstract void unlock​(java.util.Collection<TerrainTile> tiles)
        Unlocks tiles that were previously returned from a call to lock(GLMapView, Collection). After a GLMapView.TerrainTile instance has no more locks it becomes eligible for destruction.
        Parameters:
        tiles - The tiles to be unlocked

      • getElevation

        public abstract double getElevation​(GeoPoint geo)

      • dispose

        public abstract void dispose()
